title: Roger Black in the news; this time for eco-retreat
content: I follow news about prefab housing as well as new ideas for shipping containers. Delightful to discover that the [NYT story about the West Texas retreat](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417183301/http:/www.nytimes.com/2009/07/16/garden/16location.html?_r=1) turned out to feature Roger's place.
author: crossgrove

comments.content:
are those solar panels on the roofs of the containers?

I wonder what my wife might say when I suggest this for that chunk of land she wants to build on at Lake of the Woods in Ontario?

powers
Makes me long for a January trip to the desert.
A round trip from New York to Texas is an eco-retreat?
Carl are you following Nicole and Eric's progress on their Flatpak house?
On a push bike it is, Nick.
